ygData.subject: EBAY "Ripped Me Off"
ygData.msgSnippet: No wonder Ebay makes to much money. I list ONE item for sell thinking the price they say it is $15 and change and I get a bill for ( Non-Payment of $132.86
ygData.messageBody:
No wonder Ebay makes to much money. I list "ONE" item for sell
thinking the price they say it is $15 and change and I get a bill for
("Non-Payment of $132.86 Balance on your eBay account"). These people
go ripping other people off. I will never use their service again and
I would hope other people don't end up in my situation! Sorry for
venting but this is complete BS.

._.~*~._.~*~.Beverly R._.~*~._.~*~.
P.O. Box 15192
Sacramento, CA 95813

are locked up."
